original_text:
Monkey Warrior
Monkey Warrior, dal catalogo della software house Pragmatic Play, si presenta immediatamente come una slot molto moderna: già nella schermata principale, una sorta di scimmia- guerriero che indossa un’armatura dorata, sullo sfondo di un paesaggio viola, ci conduce nel tema del gioco, che strizza un occhio alla tradizione cinese da una parte e dall’altra richiama alla mente film del genere apocalittico in cui ci si muove in scenari surreali e affascinanti.
In realtà, il titolo del gioco fa riferimento a un ben preciso racconto cinese che vede come protagonista la scimmia con particolari poteri sovrannaturali, qui rivisitato in chiave moderna.
Per quanto riguarda il gameplay, questo non è particolarmente complesso: si tratta di una slot a cinque rulli con ben 243 linee di pagamento e si ottengono delle vincite con allineamenti di simboli uguali su rulli adiacenti a partire da sinistra verso destra.
L’RTP è del 96,5%, come quasi tutte le slot della Pragmatic Play, mentre la volatilità è alta, che tradotto significa vincite anche consistenti ma poco frequenti; il range di puntata è abbastanza ampio, partendo da un minimo di 25 centesimi per arrivare a un massimo di 125 €. Anche su Monkey Warrior è disponibile la funzione Autoplay, che permette di giocare in automatico dopo aver selezionato il numero di giri e l’importo che si desidera scommettere.
Simboli di Monkey Warrior
Sui rulli di Monkey Warrior si alternano simboli tematici e non: tra questi ultimi troviamo le solite carte da gioco, stavolta dal 10 all’Asso, mentre quelli tematici comprendono alcuni tra i protagonisti della storia, rappresentati da dei guerrieri cinesi di aspetto diverso, una pergamena, una pozione, una pesca e un bastone dorato.
Il simbolo Wild è la Scimmia Guerriera in persona, che ha funzione di jolly del gioco e sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli, tranne lo Scatter, per completare delle combinazioni vincenti.
Il simbolo Scatter può comparire solo sui rulli 2, 3 e 4 e quando li occupa tutti permette di accedere a dei free spins in cui ogni vincita è raddoppiata.
La funzione Money Respins e i quattro Jackpot
Tra i simboli speciali di Monkey Warrior abbiamo una succulenta pesca: sei di questi simboli permettono di accedere alla funzionalità speciale chiamata “Money Respins”, che regala subito 5 giri gratuiti, ma permette di ottenerne degli altri nel corso del gioco Bonus.
In questa slot machine non vi è un solo Jackpot ma sono ben quattro: il Mini Jackpot è quello con valore inferiore e paga solo 30 vote la puntata, a seguire abbiamo il Minor Jackpot con un moltiplicatore di x50, il Makor Jackpot che offre un premio pari a 100 volte il valore della scommessa e, per finire, il Grand Jackpot, che ha il valore più alto e permette di moltiplicare x200 volte la puntata.

raw_translation.response:
Monkey Warrior by Pragmatic Play is a highly modern slot game that immediately grabs your attention with its main screen featuring a monkey warrior donning golden armor in front of a purple backdrop. This game nods to traditional Chinese folklore and apocalyptic films, transporting players to surreally enchanting settings.
The gameplay is not particularly complex, with the slot being a five-reel game with 243 pay lines. Wins are achieved by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right. The RTP is at a high of 96.5%, typical of most Pragmatic Play slots. The volatility is also commendable, offering sizable wins but not as frequently. The betting range is relatively broad, with wagers from as low as 25 cents to as high as €125. Additionally, an Autoplay function is available to ensure seamless, uninterrupted play.
Symbols in Monkey Warrior vary from thematic to non-thematic. The former includes warriors of various Chinese appearances, a parchment, a potion, a peach, and a golden staff. The latter is composed of the usual playing cards (10 to Ace). The Monkey Warrior symbol serves as the Wild, replacing all others except the Scatter to complete winning combinations. The Scatter only appears on the second, third, and fourth reels. Occupying all three leads to free spins, with doubled winnings.
The succulent peach is a special symbol, with six of these triggering the Money Respins feature that awards five free spins and allows for additional ones to be acquired throughout the game's bonus rounds. There are four jackpots available, ranging from Mini to Grand. The Grand Jackpot is the most valuable, rewarding players with a 200x multiplier on their bet.

This game nods to traditional Chinese folklore and apocalyptic films, transporting players to surreally enchanting settings.
The gameplay is not particularly complex, with the slot being a five-reel game with 243 pay lines. Wins are achieved by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right. The RTP is at a high of 96.5%, typical of most Pragmatic Play slots. The volatility is also commendable, offering sizable wins but not as frequently. The betting range is relatively broad, with wagers from as low as 25 cents to as high as €125. Additionally, an Autoplay function is available to ensure seamless, uninterrupted play.
Symbols in Monkey Warrior vary from thematic to non-thematic. The former includes warriors of various Chinese appearances, a parchment, a potion, a peach, and a golden staff. raw_translation.response:
Monkey Warrior, from the Pragmatic Play software house, is a modern and captivating slot game. The main screen depicts a monkey warrior in golden armor against a purple landscape, which perfectly sets the tone for the game's Chinese theme with a touch of apocalyptic flair.

The gameplay is quite simple, featuring five reels and 243 paylines. The high volatility means that wins are infrequent but potentially substantial, and the range of bets ranges from a minimum of 25 cents to a maximum of 125 euros. The game also features an Autoplay function, enabling players to set the number of spins and the amount they wish to bet automatically.

The game's symbols include traditional playing cards, from 10 to Ace, as well as thematic symbols like Chinese warriors, scrolls, potions, peaches, and golden staves. The monkey warrior acts as a wild symbol, with the power to replace any other symbol except the scatter to complete a winning combination. The scatter symbol appears only on reels 2, 3, and 4 and unlocks free spins where your winnings are doubled.

One of the special features of Monkey Warrior is the Money Respins function, triggered by collecting six peach symbols. This feature awards five free spins and opportunities to earn more during the bonus game.

Finally, there are four jackpots available, ranging from the Mini Jackpot, which pays out 30 times the bet, to the Grand Jackpot, which multiplies the bet by 200! 

In short, Monkey Warrior offers a high-stakes, high-reward experience with a unique Chinese twist that will appeal to experienced gamblers and those new to the game alike.

The high volatility means that wins are infrequent but potentially substantial, and the range of bets ranges from a minimum of 25 cents to a maximum of 125 euros. The game also features an Autoplay function, enabling players to set the number of spins and the amount they wish to bet automatically.

The game's symbols include traditional playing cards, from 10 to Ace, as well as thematic symbols like Chinese warriors, scrolls, potions, peaches, and golden staves. One of the special features of Monkey Warrior is the Money Respins function, triggered by collecting six peach symbols. This feature awards five free spins and opportunities to earn more during the bonus game.

In short, Monkey Warrior offers a high-stakes, high-reward experience with a unique Chinese twist that will appeal to experienced gamblers and those new to the game alike.

response.headline: Get Ready to Go Bananas with Monkey Warrior
response.content:
Hear that? It's the sound of thunderous applause for Pragmatic Play's Monkey Warrior! This slot game boasts a Chinese folklore theme that will have you feeling like Jackie Chan in no time! With five reels and a whopping 243 pay lines, this game will have you swinging from vine to vine, just like a real monkey warrior.

And speaking of Monkey Warriors, make sure to keep an eye out for the Wild symbol, which is represented by none other than the Monkey Warrior himself. The Scatter symbol, on the other hand, can be found on the second, third, and fourth reels.

But enough monkey business, let's talk about the Money Respins feature! With four jackpots up for grabs and an Autoplay function, this game will have you feeling like you've hit the jackpot yourself. And with an RTP of 96.5%, you'll be raking in the bananas in no time!

Keep in mind that while the volatility is commendable, this game offers sizeable wins but not as frequently. So strap on your banana suit and get ready to join the ranks of the Monkey Warrior elite!

response.headline: Get Ready to Go Bananas with Monkey Warrior: Gameplay and Features
response.content:
Monkey Warrior is a game that's easy to get the hang of, so you can sit back, relax, and let the good times roll. All you need to do is connect identical symbols from the left reel to the right reel. It's so easy, even a monkey could do it (pun intended).

Speaking of betting, Monkey Warrior offers a wide range of wagers. Whether you're a high roller or a penny-pincher, this game has got you covered. With betting options ranging from 25 cents to €125, there's something for everyone.

If you're someone who likes to sit back and watch the action unfold, the Autoplay feature will be your new best friend. It ensures that the good times never have to end (or at least, not until your bankroll does).

One feature that sets Monkey Warrior apart from other slot games is the Money Respins feature. All you need to do to trigger it is land six peach symbols, and you'll receive five free spins. And if that wasn't enough, you can earn additional free spins throughout the game's bonus rounds. We're not monkeying around when we say that this feature is a game-changer (sorry not sorry).

Finally, we can't forget about the jackpots. There are four different jackpots available, ranging from Mini to Grand. And let's be real, who doesn't want to win the Grand Jackpot? It's the most valuable of the four, and will award lucky players with a whopping 200x multiplier on their bet. It's time to go bananas and see if you've got what it takes to win the big bucks!

response.headline: Visually Stunning and Thematically On-Point
response.content:
Monkey Warrior immerses you in Chinese folklore, with an armored monkey warrior gracing the main screen. It's like Mulan meets Planet of the Apes! The graphics are stunning and the attention to detail is evident in every aspect of the game. From the intricate symbols depicting various warriors and traditional objects like the parchment, potion and golden staff, to the usual playing cards, Monkey Warrior is a visual feast.

The designers went all out to give players an unforgettable gaming experience. It's not every day that you get to play a slot game that makes you feel like you're in an ancient Chinese fable. But beware, this game can be so captivating that you may forget you're not actually in the enchanted world of Monkey Warrior.

response.headline: Monkeying Around with Monkey Warrior
response.content:
If you're a fan of slots with personality and plenty of chances to win big, look no further than Monkey Warrior! With a charming Chinese folklore theme, this game is packed with exciting features - including the Money Respins feature and four available jackpots that will have you feeling like you hit the jackpot every time.

Plus, Monkey Warrior offers flexible gameplay thanks to the Autoplay function and broad betting range. And if you're looking for sizable wins (and let's be honest, who isn't?), you won't be disappointed with this game's RTP and volatility.

So why wait? Channel your inner monkey and swing into action with Monkey Warrior by Pragmatic Play - it's the ultimate way to scratch that slot game itch!

response.headline: Easy Peasy Monkey Squeezy Gameplay
response.content:
Prepare yourself to go bananas with Monkey Warrior - a laid-back casino game that's easy to play and a ton of fun!

This online slot game has five reels and 243 pay lines, so you have plenty of chances to win big. All you have to do is spin the reels and align those identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right- it's that simple. You heard it here, folks, it's so easy that even a monkey could win big!

For those who like to take it easy and let the game do the work, Monkey Warrior has got you covered with its Autoplay function. That way, you can sit back, relax and let the monkey business unfold. Trust us, you won't wanna miss a single moment.

response.headline: Get Ready for Some Monkey Business with Monkey Warrior's Special Features!
response.content:
If you're looking for a slot game full of exciting bonuses, Monkey Warrior has got you covered! This game is packed with special symbols that will have you going bananas.

The Wild Monkey symbol is the star of the show, replacing all other symbols (except the Scatter) to create winning combinations. And speaking of the Scatter, landing three of these beauties will trigger the free spins round. We promise you won't be able to get enough of the doubled winnings and endless fun.

But wait, there's more! Keep your eyes peeled for the succulent peach. Get six of these sweet symbols and you'll trigger the Money Respins feature. You'll get five free spins, with a chance to acquire even more during the bonus rounds. And let's not forget about the chance to win one of four jackpots, ranging from Mini to Grand. With the Grand Jackpot being worth 200x the player's bet, you might just go bananas!

response.meta_description: Play the Monkey Warrior slot game by Pragmatic Play for free. Review, betting range, RTP & features.

meta.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Monkey Warrior".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Game Description

Monkey Warrior by Pragmatic Play is a slot game with a strong Chinese folklore theme. The game is played on five reels and 243 pay lines. Monkey Warrior serves as the Wild, with the Scatter appearing on the second, third, and fourth reels. The game boasts a lucrative Money Respins feature, four jackpots, and an Autoplay function. The RTP is at a high of 96.5%, and the volatility is commendable, offering sizeable wins but not as frequently.

Gameplay and Features

Monkey Warrior is not particularly complex, with wins achieved by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right. The game offers a broad betting range with wagers from as low as 25 cents to as high as €125. The Autoplay feature ensures uninterrupted play. The Money Respins feature, which is triggered by landing six peach symbols, awards five free spins, and additional ones can be acquired throughout the game's bonus rounds. Four jackpots are available, ranging from Mini to Grand, with the Grand Jackpot being the most valuable, rewarding players with a 200x multiplier on their bet.

Visuals and Design

Monkey Warrior features a strong Chinese folklore theme, with the game's main screen displaying a monkey warrior in golden armor. The surreal and enchanting settings bring to mind apocalyptic films and traditional Chinese folklore. The symbols vary from thematic to non-thematic, with the former including warriors of various Chinese appearances, a parchment, a potion, a peach, and a golden staff. The latter is composed of the usual playing cards (10 to Ace).

Betting and Jackpots

Monkey Warrior offers a broad betting range, allowing wagers from as low as 25 cents to as high as €125. There are four jackpots available, ranging from Mini to Grand. The Grand Jackpot is the most valuable, rewarding players with a 200x multiplier on their bet.

Appeal to Players

Players who enjoy slot games with strong themes and lucrative features will find Monkey Warrior appealing. The game's Chinese folklore theme, Money Respins feature, and four available jackpots make it an exciting experience. The Autoplay function and broad betting range allow for seamless and flexible gameplay. The game's RTP and volatility are also commendable, offering sizable wins but not as frequently. Overall, Monkey Warrior by Pragmatic Play is a modern slot game that offers an enjoyable and potentially rewarding experience.

Review:
 
Gameplay

Monkey Warrior is a relatively simple slot game, with five reels and 243 pay lines. The objective is to align identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right in order to win. The game's Autoplay function ensures seamless and uninterrupted play.

Graphics and Design

Monkey Warrior's graphics and design are highly modern, with a golden armored monkey warrior as the main character against a purple backdrop. The game's setting is inspired by traditional Chinese folklore and apocalyptic films, creating an enchanting and surreally beautiful atmosphere.

Special Features

Monkey Warrior features several special symbols, including the Wild Monkey symbol that can replace all others (except the Scatter) to complete winning combinations. The Scatter only appears on the second, third, and fourth reels, and landing three scattered symbols will trigger the game's free spins round with doubled winnings. The succulent peach is a special symbol that triggers the Money Respins feature when six are acquired, awarding five free spins and allowing for additional ones to be acquired throughout the bonus rounds. The game also features four jackpots, ranging from Mini to Grand, with the Grand Jackpot being the most valuable at 200x the player's bet.

Jackpots

There are four jackpots available in Monkey Warrior, including the Mini, Minor, Major, and Grand jackpots. The Grand Jackpot is the most valuable, offering players a 200x multiplier on their bet.

RTP and Betting Range

Monkey Warrior has an RTP of 96.5%, which is typical of most other Pragmatic Play slots. The game's volatility is high, with sizable wins but not as frequently. The betting range is relatively broad, with wagers from as low as 25 cents to as high as €125.

faq.question: What is Monkey Warrior?
faq.answer: Monkey Warrior is an online slot game by Pragmatic Play that pays homage to traditional Chinese folklore and apocalyptic movies.

faq.answer: Monkey Warrior is a five-reel game with 243 pay lines.

faq.answer: Wins in Monkey Warrior are achieved by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right.

faq.answer: The betting range in Monkey Warrior is relatively broad, with wagers from as low as 25 cents to as high as €125.

faq.answer: Yes, an Autoplay function is available in Monkey Warrior to ensure seamless, uninterrupted play.

faq.answer: The special symbols in Monkey Warrior include the Wild (Monkey Warrior symbol), Scatter (appears on the second, third, and fourth reels), and the peach (triggers the Money Respins feature).

dalle-prompt.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Monkey Warrior".

        Please provide a detailed prompt for DALLE to create a feature image fitting the game
        
        - The image should be in cartoon style
        - The should feature a happy Maya warrior with glasses

        Review: Monkey Warrior by Pragmatic Play is a highly modern slot game that immediately grabs your attention with its main screen featuring a monkey warrior donning golden armor in front of a purple backdrop. This game nods to traditional Chinese folklore and apocalyptic films, transporting players to surreally enchanting settings.
The gameplay is not particularly complex, with the slot being a five-reel game with 243 pay lines. Wins are achieved by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right. The RTP is at a high of 96.5%, typical of most Pragmatic Play slots. The volatility is also commendable, offering sizable wins but not as frequently. The betting range is relatively broad, with wagers from as low as 25 cents to as high as €125. Additionally, an Autoplay function is available to ensure seamless, uninterrupted play.
Symbols in Monkey Warrior vary from thematic to non-thematic. The former includes warriors of various Chinese appearances, a parchment, a potion, a peach, and a golden staff. The latter is composed of the usual playing cards (10 to Ace). The Monkey Warrior symbol serves as the Wild, replacing all others except the Scatter to complete winning combinations. The Scatter only appears on the second, third, and fourth reels. Occupying all three leads to free spins, with doubled winnings.
The succulent peach is a special symbol, with six of these triggering the Money Respins feature that awards five free spins and allows for additional ones to be acquired throughout the game's bonus rounds. There are four jackpots available, ranging from Mini to Grand. The Grand Jackpot is the most valuable, rewarding players with a 200x multiplier on their bet.
